The show and books are both historical fiction, meaning the author took inspirations or figures but made them his own thing. Haesten is one of those as he doesnt correlate to the historical reference you found other than the name.

 Cornwall didnt go into explicit detail of where each character inspiration came from so impossible to say for certain beyond the lore in the books supporting the assertion. Read the books.

You clearly have never played the game...that was a good strike on target and from a reaction snapshot off a deflection. In that scenarion you have 2 options a) power shot b) go for a delicate placement.

Option a is what youd like to see more often from a 9 if on target as a block is still usually bobbled where something can happen and you have higher likelihood of getting past just the keeper s hands. Option b takes incredible composure and has a much lower success given the higher liklihood of a catch with the slower shot requiring slower reaction.

Dont disagree, does it have some potentially problematic moments- yes but neither of those have to do with fanservice or harem for the post...its an entertaining solid series overall. Not amazing or perfect but fits their ask.

"Makes no sense to suggest" is a huge leap there. If youre a purist, thats cool but dont think this sub or post is relevant to purist anime concept.

Also link click was produced in China. A1 produced Solo levelling so ypur comment tracks there but again its still an mahnwa and korean base style and source so just as much validity of why it shouldnt be included as the rest if youre truly a purist.

Id dispute your dispute :). If THATS considered fan service then youre reaching pretty hard. Does a character have big boob- yes, is it the focus in any pervy or unnecesary way -no. In fact anything thats made overt like character design is a character development and talking point in the series. Also being a romcom there is some level of sexual tension but this is kept to pg level.

Anime just means its from japan but its still the same style. If you get into those nuanxes then solo levelling and link click arent either as ones korean amd the other chinese but both are top rated and popular series in the anine genre. I could add cyberpunk and arcane here to that as well.

Kinda a random tipic to represent demonizing the poor. Theres a myriad of reasons for this particular action and if its combined with other support systems (like housing, mental health, job prep training..etc) then the criminalization itself isnt the issue. Given that in general those practices (public camping) are abused and attract criminals to hide among the legitimate poor. This again has a wide domino effect of negatives in an economy and city if not regulated and assisted adequately. 

Carte blanche legal camping is not helpful nor good for anyone.

Best response to this kind of boss: not do a damn thing you arent explicity told to do and how. "I was told to follow your orders and not do the job I was hired to do (FEMA)  so I have complied with the things I was told to do by the letter."

AC Milan has 58 major trophies, including 37 domestic titles and 17 european titles and 4 worldwide titles

Inter Milan has 46 major trophies, including 37 domestic titles, 6 european, 3 worldwide titles

As an example, many people will say Mbappe was mvp of France 2022 run due to his goal tally but the power of that team and who actually performed best was Griezman and the midfield. Right there with you. Many of the classic legendary teams have been suffering to rebuild. AC Milan, Barca, Man Utd, Chelsea...it is the cycle of football as owners, managers and players rotate and bring both good and bad.

But considering the substantial financial trouble we're coming from, the youth and lack of depth of this squad; what has been accomplished this season is amazing and brings hope for the next several years to come.

Winning the Classico still gives us a treble of trophies taken directly from RM. 

This semi while frustrating gave me the most hope for the future.

Nope, a tie leaves us at 4pts ahead so doesnt clinch the title. A loss leaves us at 1pt ahead and 3 games to hang on id rather not have to. If we win its mathmatically done as even losing all 3 remaining we'd be 1 pt clear.
If we beat Madrid in the classico we win the league. Hard but oh so sweet to end it that way.

I love Leao. On Milan. Leao on his day is unplayable with amazing speed and technique but dives easily and doesnt do much defensively (mainly as his role is the outlet for counters). His stats defend his consistency more than watching the performances or anecdotes. Some mention passing could be an issue too but I think hes gifted enough it wouldnt be but his level would rize with whats actually expevted of him and his status in the team. Now hes the jey character and prince so hes comfortable- too comfortable.

I dont think hed be the right fit for this barca team unless he adopted a different attitude to match the teams. When hes determined, he does all the right defensive moves, offensive moves and takes responsibility but is that the coach? Hard to say with how tumultuous milan have been.

While ManU is going through rough times, Ill stick there. We are still getting silverware unlike some clubs.

I understand your point as well and dont think its unreasonable but that its more complicated than that as the game evolved and you start looking at additional scenarios that arent as easy as the one you mentioned up until you get to the miniscule infractions like the one I mentioned. What is an 'unfair advantage'? Thats the source here

Yes, again you can also score with that too. So if you were standing like that for a free kick and it bounced off your shoulder into the net should it count? These are the type of things that happen. Playing in multiple countries and continents I at least appreciate it as is.

Arm isnt considered but goal scoring parts of your body are, like your head. In my experience, it makes a difference. You can make all kinds of different scenario arguments but the most common is running in the same direction with an early cross across or a head start to break the line with a ball over the top.

Most teams have a membership you can join and buy tickets through that ranges from free to tiers of paid. They generally also offer discounts and early purchasing or exclusive access for higher tiers you pay more for annually. This is tge best option to ensure you're with the Barca supporting area and tickets. 

I recommend avoiding resale tickets for foreign games. Resale tickets are hard to navigate as there are terms and conditions that might apply for home vs away sections that aren't clear upon purchase you'd have to look up at the clubs website.

As a player, it really does make a difference to have that extra lean for momentum or head start so id be upset if it changed back to something lesser. Link click

Berserk 1997

Berserk (1997) - seinen, gritty, dark mideival fantasy war series covering human struggle, greed, and capacity (including dealing with SA). What happens when the myths ans legends collide with the real world of humans?

86 - gritty realistic scifi war series with excellent character dev, tear jerker

Is it wrong to pick up girls in a dungeon - more light hearted battle series about gods playing out games on a planet with a dungeon and the last true 'hero'

Full metal alchemist- the science of equal exchange, value of a life, human experimentation and more covered in a country at war by a comedic adolescent

Deathnote - shonen thriller about societal restructuring, good and evil, vigilante justice

Blue eyed samurai - revenge story for an individual with 2 huge secrets in the japanese samurai society. Excellent fight scenes and period accuracy.

Samurai champloo - what does sunflowers smell like? 3 unlikely companions search for answers in a fun, action packed samurai series with excellent fight choreography involving 1 anything goes unconventionsl samurai and a purist

Wolfs rain- action adventure in a post apocalyptic lore filled world

Cowboy bebop - masterpiece of a jazzy episodal action adventure with scifi setting

Link click - timetravel drama thriller with great art

Apothecary diaries - political intrigue, medical mystery and slow burn romance in chinese period piece setting

Ghost in the shell standalone complex - scifi psychological action adventure delving into identity, reality and technology in society

Gungrave- gangster action drama based on a videogame and crosses into genetic mutation/'vampires'

Samurai 7 - scifi take on the classic 7 samurai story.

Kingdom of ruin -action adventure about a world where witches are a race being culled in genocide by new pro human faction. Brutal and gore.
